metadata.synopsis: plays when you kill the hook horrors. There are two nodes: one for the first horror killed and another for when the last one dies.

0.speaker: Filro the Forgotten
0.context: NodeContext: Delusionally thinks you've killed his love (you really killed a horrible beast)

1.speaker: Filro the Forgotten
1.context: NodeContext: You killed a second hook horror. He's incensed.
